# config for elan -track pad#

- In order to configure the `tap to touch` option in your track pad

```shell
/etc/X11/xorg.conf.d/30-touchpad.conf
Section "InputClass"
        Identifier "MyTouchpad"
        MatchIsTouchpad "on"
        Driver "libinput"
        Option "Tapping" "on"
EndSection
```
